ValidationRule.description: This validation rules makes it mandatory for the PRM to enter the reason for attempted but unavailable for each meeting
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( HAM_Meeting_Status__c , 'Attempted unavailable') , ISBLANK( HAM_Meeting_cancellation_Reason__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the reason why donor specified he/she is unavailable for the meeting this will be helpful for reporting purpose and future meetings
